title: Remove “Built with using caffeine.ai” attribution from footer

requirements.text: Remove the footer attribution text/link that reads “Built with … using caffeine.ai” (including the heart icon and the external link to caffeine.ai) so it is no longer displayed anywhere in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders the attribution paragraph containing the text “Built with” / “using” and the “caffeine.ai” link.
No other footer content is removed or changed (copyright and disclaimer remain visible and unchanged).
There is no remaining visible “caffeine.ai” branding text/link anywhere in the app UI.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing footer styling beyond what is necessary to remove the attribution block.
Any backend changes or Motoko canister changes.
